name: Waleed M
title: Senior Software Engineer (.NET & Angular)
summary: Results-driven Full-Stack Developer with 8+ years of experience in .NET, Angular, and SQL. Led $500K+ projects and managed teams of up to 10 developers. Specializes in scalable, high-performance systems with OpenSearch, Blazor, Identity Server, and distributed services.
aboutMe:
I am a results-driven Full-Stack Developer with 8+ years of expertise in .NET, .NET Core, Web API, MVC, Blazor, Angular, and SQL technologies. Throughout my career, I've successfully led projects with budgets exceeding $500,000 and managed development teams of up to 10 members.

I specialize in building high-performance, secure, and scalable solutions, having implemented OpenSearch integrations that improved query speeds by 90% and developed robust payment systems with Duende/Identity Server. My technical toolkit includes C#, TypeScript, JavaScript, SQL, Azure DevOps, Git, and Agile methodologies.

Having worked with companies across Europe, the United States, and Canada, I thrive in fast-paced, diverse environments. I'm passionate about building and optimizing reliable, high-availability distributed services, with a keen eye for detail and a collaborative approach. As a quick learner who enjoys new challenges, I continuously seek opportunities to expand my skills and deliver exceptional solutions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
highlights: Operating within a project-based model, engaging with diverse projects and clients across industries, ensuring versatility and agility.
Collaborating closely with 10 projects and 3 companies, leveraging expertise to deliver tailored solutions and drive successful metrics.
Contributing uniquely customized solutions, achieving a 40% increase in project efficiency and client satisfaction across diverse environments.

experience.title: Contract Software Engineer
highlights: Integrated complex third-party providers such as Trifft and Zonal systems into existing Order and Pay platforms for one of the largest restaurant companies in the UK.
Spearheaded the implementation of an Identity Server 4, fortifying API security and ensuring the protection of sensitive data.
Integrated Spire API using GraphQL, reducing data retrieval time by 60% and enabling real-time tracking and retrieval of vessel information, significantly enhancing project capabilities.
Implemented Azure webhooks for seamless synchronization of Azure Active Directory (AD) users, resulting in a 45% improvement in user data accuracy and a 20% reduction in user-related issues.
Incorporated Braintree payment gateway for card payments, Google Pay, and Apple Pay.
Provided support to 8 enterprise projects.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
highlights: Engineered the project from scratch, including data migration from old software to new.
Developed modules e.g. Capture, Process, and Comply, increasing productivity by 50%.
Carried out quality control, production, auditing, maintenance, safety protocol features, and enhancing compliance.
Integrated OpenSearch, boosting search speed by 90%.
Built the web application with Angular 15 and .NET Core API, reducing load times by 80%.
Deployed applications using Azure DevOps and manual techniques, reducing deployment time by 75%.

experience.title: Tech Lead & Software Engineer
highlights: Spearheaded the upgrade of the talk EHR project from Angular 6 to Angular 9, yielding a 25% improvement in application response time.
Led and managed a 10-person operations team, ensuring efficient project execution and achieving a 95% reduction in service loading time through codebase refactoring.
Directed server monitoring, sprint management, and release management, and conducted code reviews to maintain high-quality standards.

experience.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Developed key modules for the talk EHR application: Document Manager, Schedulers, and Rights Authorization, enhancing functionality.
Integrated APIs for ICDs and CPTs, reducing coding errors by 30% and improving efficiency by 25%, enhancing medical coding accuracy.
Resolved operational issues in Charts and Claims, resulting in a 15% improvement in overall application performance.

experience.title: Software Developer
highlights: Significantly contributed to the development of Meeting Point, completing the project 10 days ahead of schedule and boosting user adoption.
Ensured Meeting Point aligned with requirements, reducing post-launch issues and improving user satisfaction by 35%.
Produced comprehensive product documentation for Meeting Point, resulting in a 60% decrease in user inquiries and improved self-service usability.
